data.name: Charmeleon

abilities.name: Burning Fighter
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may discard the top 5 cards of your deck. If any of those cards are Fire Energy cards, attach them to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: When it swings its burning tail, it elevates the air temperature to unbearably high levels.

data.name: Charmeleon
data.flavorText: It lashes about with its tail to knock down its foe. It then tears up the fallen opponent with sharp claws.

attacks.name: Thunder Jolt
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, Charmeleon does 10 damage to itself.

data.name: Charmeleon

attacks.name: Fire Fang
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

data.flavorText: It lashes about with its tail to knock down its foe. It then tears up the fallen opponent with sharp claws.

data.name: Charmeleon

attacks.name: Raging Claws
attacks.text: Does 10 more damage for each damage counter on this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: In the rocky mountains where Charmeleon live, their fiery tails shine at night like stars.

data.name: Charmeleon

attacks.name: Raging Flames
attacks.text: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck.

data.flavorText: It has a barbaric nature. In battle, it whips its fiery tail around and slashes away with sharp claws.

attacks.name: Bonfire
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. For each heads, discard 1 Fire Energy card attached to Blaine's Charmeleon. If you can't discard Energy cards, this attack does nothing. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads to each of your opponent's Pokémon. Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for this attack. (Any other effects that would happen after applying Weakness and Resistance still happen.)

attacks.name: Rage
attacks.text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Charmeleon.

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.text: Discard a Fire Energy attached to Charmeleon.

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, Charmeleon does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.text: Discard 1 Fire Energy card attached to Charmeleon in order to use this attack.

attacks.name: Slam
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

data.flavorText: In the rocky mountains where Charmeleon live, their fiery tails shine at night like stars.

attacks.name: Damage Burn
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage.

data.name: Dark Charmeleon

attacks.name: Fireball
attacks.text: Use this attack only if there are any Fire Energy cards attached to Dark Charmeleon. Flip a coin. If heads, discard 1 of those Energy cards. If tails, this attack does nothing (not even damage).

data.flavorText: Its tail is incredibly strong, able to lift up to 5 adult men.

attacks.name: Scary Face
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon can't attack or retreat during your opponent's next turn.

data.name: Charmeleon

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.text: Discard 1 Fire Energy card attached to Charmeleon or this attack does nothing.

data.flavorText: When it swings its burning tail, it raises the temperature to unbearably high levels.

data.name: Charmeleon

attacks.name: Fire Fang
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Flare Tail
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard a Fire Energy attached to Charmeleon and this attack does 50 damage plus 20 more damage.

data.flavorText: In the rocky mountains where CHARMELEON live, their fiery tails shine at night like stars.

attacks.name: Double Scratch
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.text: Discard 1 Fire Energy card attached to Charmeleon.

data.name: Charmeleon

attacks.name: Call for Support
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Supporter card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

data.flavorText: My precious friend who is always with me. I have so many things I want to tell you.

attacks.name: Smokescreen
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Fireworks
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard a Fire Energy card attached to Charmeleon.
